# Week3
## Hierarchical MOdel

```{r}
d = read.table("rattumor.txt", header=TRUE)
head(d)
summary(d)
```
```{r}
with(d, hist(y/N, freq=FALSE, xlim=c(0,1)))
```

## JAGS model specification
```{r}
model {
  for (j in length(y)){
    y[j] ~dbin(theta[j], N[j])
    theta[j]~ dbeta(alpha, beta)
  }
  
  alpha ~ dexp(0.001)
  beta ~ dexp(0.001)
}

library("rjags")
```
